ticket.subject: Account access blocked
ticket.description: I cannot access my account. The system says I have exceeded login attempts. Please unblock my account immediately as I need urgent access.

ticket.subject: Production error: Service unavailable
ticket.description: The production service is returning 503 Service Unavailable errors. This is affecting all users. We need immediate investigation.

ticket.subject: Billing not reflecting promotional discount
ticket.description: I applied a promotional code during checkout but the discount was not applied to my invoice. I was charged the full price instead of the discounted amount.

ticket.subject: Feature: Dark mode theme
ticket.description: Would be nice to have a dark mode option for nighttime usage. This would reduce eye strain and improve usability in low light conditions.

ticket.subject: Defect: Data export truncates content
ticket.description: When exporting data to CSV, text with commas gets truncated. The export is not properly escaping special characters.

ticket.subject: Two-factor authentication not working
ticket.description: 2FA is enabled on my account but I am not receiving the authentication codes via SMS. This is blocking my access to the system.

ticket.subject: Performance: Slow page load times
ticket.description: Dashboard is taking more than 10 seconds to load. This is affecting productivity. The issue started after the recent update.

ticket.subject: Missing invoice for billing period
ticket.description: I have not received the invoice for the last billing period. The invoice should have been sent on the 1st of the month. Please resend it.

ticket.subject: Feature: Batch operations
ticket.description: Need ability to perform operations on multiple items at once. Currently I have to process items one by one which is very inefficient.

ticket.subject: Defect: Report generation fails
ticket.description: The custom report generation tool crashes when trying to generate reports with large datasets. Error log shows OutOfMemoryException.

ticket.subject: Account verification stuck
ticket.description: My account verification has been pending for 2 weeks. I submitted all required documents but status has not changed.

ticket.subject: API rate limiting is too strict
ticket.description: Current API rate limits are too restrictive for our high-volume application. We need higher limits or a way to request increased limits.

ticket.subject: Payment failed but amount was deducted
ticket.description: My payment transaction failed but the amount was still deducted from my account. I need an immediate refund.

ticket.subject: Mobile app UI responsiveness issues
ticket.description: The mobile app is not responsive on small screens. Buttons and text are overlapping. The app is unusable on phones.

ticket.subject: Feature: Multi-language support
ticket.description: Would like the application to support multiple languages for international users. At minimum Spanish, French, and German.

ticket.subject: Security issue: API keys in logs
ticket.description: Found API keys exposed in application logs. This is a critical security vulnerability that needs immediate remediation.

ticket.subject: Email notifications not sending
ticket.description: I have email notifications enabled but I am not receiving any emails from the system. Check if email service is configured correctly.

ticket.subject: Feature: Advanced search filters
ticket.description: Current search functionality is too basic. Need advanced filters and the ability to save search queries for future use.

ticket.subject: Defect: Form validation errors unclear
ticket.description: Form validation error messages are confusing and do not clearly explain what is wrong. Need more descriptive error messages.

ticket.subject: Session timeout is too aggressive
ticket.description: Session times out too quickly during active use. I get logged out after 15 minutes of inactivity which is too short for my workflow.

ticket.subject: Database backup verification needed
ticket.description: Need to verify that database backups are being created and can be restored. Critical for disaster recovery planning.

ticket.subject: Feature: Webhook support
ticket.description: Need webhook support to integrate with external systems. This would enable real-time event notifications.

ticket.subject: SSL certificate expiring soon
ticket.description: SSL certificate will expire in 10 days. Renewal is critical to avoid service disruption and maintain secure HTTPS connections.

ticket.subject: Defect: Date picker not working
ticket.description: The date picker component is not working in Firefox. Works fine in Chrome. Need cross-browser compatibility fix.

ticket.subject: Feature: Custom dashboard widgets
ticket.description: Would be useful to have customizable dashboard widgets that users can arrange and configure based on their needs.

ticket.subject: Memory leak causing server crashes
ticket.description: Server keeps crashing with out of memory errors after running for a few hours. Appears to be a memory leak in the application.

ticket.subject: Duplicate order confirmation emails
ticket.description: Customers receiving multiple order confirmation emails for single orders. Email queue appears to have a bug causing duplicates.

ticket.subject: Feature: Audit trail for data changes
ticket.description: Need comprehensive audit trail showing all data changes with timestamp and user information for compliance purposes.

ticket.subject: Connection timeout to external service
ticket.description: Application fails to connect to external payment processing service. Timeout occurs after 30 seconds. Need to increase timeout or investigate service availability.

ticket.subject: Feature: Scheduled reports
ticket.description: Would be useful to schedule reports to run automatically at specified times and be emailed to stakeholders.
